error.below-in-amount: The value must be smaller than the minimum Shuttle-In amount
error.below-out-amount: The value must be smaller than the minimum Shuttle-Out amount
error.above-in-fee: The value must be greater than the Shuttle-In fee
error.above-out-fee: The value must be greater than the Shuttle-Out fee
error.above-current: The value must be greater than the minimum mortgage amount

for-not-update: Indicates not to update the deposit amount
mortgage-popup:
将抵押数量更新为您输入的数值
当前余额将被退回
popup-cool: 为了避免规则频繁波动，规则修改后有5分钟的冻结时间，解冻后方可再次修改
locked: 规则冻结期内，暂时无法修改
